titles.title: Built-In Gain Economic Growth Act of 2001

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the special tax imposed on the recognition of built-in gain by an S corporation shall not apply to the extent such gain is reinvested in the business.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/12/2001--Introduced. Built-In Gain Economic Growth Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the tax imposed on the recognition of built-in gain by an S corporation shall not apply to the extent such gain is reinvested in the business.
